  • Method Details

    • getWarehouseCapacity

      int getWarehouseCapacity​(String name)
      Getter for a Warehouse's capacity.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Warehouse
      Returns:
      the Warehouse capacity, -1 if the warehouse doesn't exist
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null or blank
      IllegalStateException - if there are no warehouses

    • setWarehouseCapacity

      boolean setWarehouseCapacity​(String name, int capacity)
      Setter for a Warehouse's capacity.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Warehouse
      capacity - the new Warehouse capacity
      Returns:
      the Warehouse capacity
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null or blank
      IllegalArgumentException - if the capacity is less or equal than zero
      IllegalStateException - if there are no warehouses

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Warehouse
      Returns:
      the Warehouse stock, -1 if the warehouse doesn't exist
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null or blank
      IllegalStateException - if there are no warehouses

    • loadWarehouseStock

      int loadWarehouseStock​(String name, int stock)
      Loads a Warehouse's stock.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Warehouse
      stock - the stock to be loaded
      Returns:
      the loaded stock, -1 if the warehouse doesn't exist
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null or blank
      IllegalArgumentException - if the stock is less or equal than zero
      IllegalStateException - if there are no warehouses

    • unloadWarehouseStock

      stock - the stock to be unloaded
      Returns:
      the unloaded stock, -1 if the warehouse doesn't exist
      Throws:

      IllegalArgumentException - if the stock is less or equal than zero
      IllegalStateException - if there are no warehouses
